mapper.select: with T01 as ( select lot_no from lots where lot_group in ( SELECT A.lot_group FROM iqc_data_master A WHERE A.updated_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL 6 MONTH AND A.result1 is not null AND A.result2 is not null AND A.result2 is not null ) union SELECT DISTINCT A.lot_no FROM iqc_results A WHERE A.updated_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL 6 MONTH ), T02 as ( select * from pih_stores where wh > 0 ), T03 as ( SELECT T02.model, A.lot_group, T02.lot_no FROM T02 left join lots A on T02.lot_no = A.lot_no WHERE T02.lot_no NOT IN (SELECT lot_no FROM T01) ) SELECT T03.model, T03.lot_group, count(T03.lot_no) amount FROM T03 group by T03.lot_group
